name: Tongue Tied
description:
Use your super amphibian powers to catch flies as they attempt to eat your cookie! Use the mouse to control and click to shoot out your tongue. Be on the lookout for special flies that will give you a short power up! If the flies eat your cookie, its game over so watch out!

This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 79. The theme of the jam was frogs and there was a limitation of there only being one level.

Team Members:

Jenni Rivers - Art/Programming https://twitter.com/XazzyArts

Jacob McFarland - Programming  https://twitter.com/Jacobz_Gamez

Jacob Gallego - Programming https://twitter.com/omosurode
